Quoting Gabriele Brysch <Gabriele.Brysch@...>:

> hi,
> 
> but what's about testing setter-methodes, if in there you're
> doing some value (-range) checks ?! i think then it make
> sense to test them ..

Agreed. The moment the setX() method does anything more than "this.something = 
something;", it usually becomes worth testing.
